import { cn } from '@gentleduck/duck-libs/cn' import { Button } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/button' import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/card' import { Switch } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/switch' import { BellRing, Check } from 'lucide-react' const notifications = [ { title: 'Your call has been confirmed.', description: '1 hour ago', }, { title: 'You have a new message!', description: '1 hour ago', }, { title: 'Your subscription is expiring soon!', description: '2 hours ago', }, ] type CardProps = React.ComponentProps export default function CardDemo({ className, ...props }: CardProps) { return ( Notifications You have 3 unread messages.

Push Notifications

Send notifications to device.

{notifications.map((notification, index) => (

{notification.title}

{notification.description}

))}
) }
